kl_scene_container_2d_t Struct Reference

Field Documentation

float* anchor_xy

Anchor point for entires in the scene. Indexed by id * 2.

kl_idx_allocator_t id_allocator

Allocates indices into the scene.

uint32_t max_entries

Maximum number of entires in the scene.

uint32_t max_id

Maximum id value which is currently reserved.

uint32_t min_id

Minimum id value which is currently reserved.

uint32_t pid

Process index for this scene container in its process_manager.

float* pos_xy

Positions for entries in the scene. Indexed by id * 2.

kl_process_manager_t process_manager

Process manager on which this scene container is registered.

float* radius

Circular bounds radius for entires in the scene. Indexed by id.

int* reference

Lua reference associated with each entry. Indexed by id.

float* rotation

Rotation around anchor point, in radians. Indexed by id.

uint32_t* typemask

Typemasks for entries in the scene. Indexed by id.
